name: Guns Blazing - Item Shop, Mouse and 4k support
name_original: Guns Blazing - Item Shop, Mouse and 4k support
description:
Guns Blazing - Item Shop, Mouse and 4k support is a game developed by mike_at_root. It was originally released in 2021.
Guns Blazing - Item Shop, Mouse and 4k support is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
